text: Gabriel Christian "Gabe" Brown (born February 22, 1990), is an American- Canadian YouTuber, singer-songwriter, producer, voice actor, animator, and U.S. Navy veteran. ==Biography== Born on February 22, 1990 in Annapolis, Maryland, he started to dabble on YouTube. He has over 4 million subscribers on his YouTube channel. ==Personal life== Brown is from Annapolis, Maryland, and currently lives in Tucson, Arizona. He is married to Claire Corlett, who is best known as the voice of Sweetie Belle in My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, as of November 2022. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 2013 Speedy and Stretch Beat It: Lead singer 2014 Beat It PMV Himself 2015 Littlest Pet Shop Featured Singer Episodes: "The Tiniest Animal Store" and "Pitch Purrfect" 2013-2016 Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures Performer 45 episodes 2016 Finding Dory Becky (voice) Uncredited 2017 Mashed Singer Episode: "OVERWATCH: No Mercy - The Living Tombstone" 2017 Asdfmovie Sheep (voice) Episode: â€œAsdfmovie10" 2014-2017 Kristoff und Schloff Kristoff Main role, miniseries 2017 Geronimo Stilton Johnny, Mike (voice) Episode: "Lights, Camera, Action!" 2019 Hazbin Hotel Alastor (singing voice) Pilot only 2021 Wizards Take Flight Dobby (voice) Video game 2021 Chaos at Hogwarts Dobby (voice) Video game 2022 Johnny Test Jingle Singer #1, Piano Panda (voice) Episodes: "Johnny's Got Game" and "Johnny Presents: The Dukey Channel" 2022 The Treebees Timber Episodes: "Caterpillars and Butterflies and "Baby Honey Bee" 2022 Merry a Christmas to You Himself Music video, featuring Claire Corlett 2023 Thumb Wars IX: The Thighs of Skyskipper Chancellor Palpy Completed production 2024 Billie Bust-Up Barnaby (voice) Pre-production == Controversy == In December 2023, Brown was hit with allegations in a call-out thread made by Twitter user Brony Fandont, accusing him of grooming his now-wife, Claire Corlett, who met Brown when she was 14 years old and he was 25. ==References== ==Other websites== * *YouTube channel Category:American YouTubers Category:1990 births Category:Living people
